description:
Are you ready to clash!? Classic arcade action combines with brain bending puzzles for a CRAZY new gameplay style! Clasherball is a wild action puzzle game where players need to match four balls of the same color to remove them from the field, but look out! Those balls become dangerous once they clash! If the player’s launcher gets hit too many times, it’s wipeout time, dude!

Features 5 unique worlds with 2 more unlockable through gameplay.

More than 100 unique challenging puzzles with sweat inducing gimmicks.

Infinite mode allows players to chase after high scores and see how long that can survive!

Get ready to clash some balls! Are you game?
name: Clasherball
